description: This file contains CMake functions for handling header-only library configurations, such as generating CMake config files and pkg-config files for projects. It defines functions to process installation and configuration tasks related to header-only dependencies, including locating templates, validating targets, generating version files, and setting up installation rules.

methods.name: HeaderOnlyInstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Defines a function to generate and install CMake config files for a target, handling dependencies and versioning.

methods.name: HeaderOnlyInstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Defines a function to generate and install pkg-config files for a target, configuring include directories and libraries.
